name: Meditation Sessions
description: Guided meditation sessions to reduce stress, improve focus, and enhance mental clarity. Available in group or private sessions.

name: Recovery Services
description: Professional recovery services including massage therapy, foam rolling, and stretching to accelerate muscle recovery.

name: Diet Consultations
description: One-on-one consultations with certified nutritionists to create personalized meal plans that align with your fitness goals.

name: Stress Management
description: Comprehensive stress management workshops and sessions combining breathing techniques, mindfulness, and lifestyle coaching.
